Class Game

java.lang.Object

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

    Game​(java.lang.String traderName, int gameDuration, Ship ship, int islandTotal)
    Creates an instance of the game, this is where all the data about the game is stored.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String traderName, int gameDuration, Ship ship, int islandTotal)
      Creates an instance of the game, this is where all the data about the game is stored.
      Parameters:
      traderName - the name the player chooses for their character.
      gameDuration - the the duration the player chooses to play the game.
      ship - the ship the player chooses to use.
      islandTotal - the amount of islands that will be generated. (5 is in specifications).

  • Method Details

    • getGameDuration

      public int getGameDuration()
      Returns:
      the duration chosen during game setup.

    • setDaysRemaining

      public void setDaysRemaining​(int daysSailed)
      Sets the amount of days remaining in the game. Used to determine if there is enough days remaining to sail chosen routes/continue the game.
      Parameters:
      daysSailed - the amount of days, as an int, taken to sail the chosen route.

    • getDaysRemaining

      public int getDaysRemaining()
      Returns:
      the amount of days, as an int, remaining before the game should end.

    • canSailToAnotherIsland

      public boolean canSailToAnotherIsland()
      Checks to see if it is possible to sail to another island. Used to check whether or not the game should be ended.
      Returns:
      a boolean true if you can sail and false if you cannot.

    • getShip

      public Ship getShip()
      Returns:
      the Ship object.

    • getTrader

      public Trader getTrader()
      Returns:
      the Trader object.

    • createIslands

      public java.util.List<Island> createIslands​(int islandTotal)
      Creates a list of Island objects. Also creates an instance of IslandNameHandler which is used to designate names to the islands.
      Parameters:
      islandTotal - the total number of islands to be generated.
      Returns:
      a list of Island objects.

    • createRoutes

      public java.util.List<Route> createRoutes​(java.util.List<Island> islands)
      Creates a list of Route objects which connect the islands.
      Parameters:
      islands - a list of Island objects to be linked by Routes/.
      Returns:
      a list to Route objects.

    • getIslands

      public java.util.List<Island> getIslands()
      Returns:
      a list of the Island objects used in the current instance of the game.

    • getRoutes

      public java.util.List<Route> getRoutes()
      Returns:
      a list of all the Route objects generated for the current instance of the game.
